GSD.description: The ZlibDecoders in Netty 4.1.x before 4.1.46 allow for unbounded memory allocation while decoding a ZlibEncoded byte stream. An attacker could send a large ZlibEncoded byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.

description_data.value: The ZlibDecoders in Netty 4.1.x before 4.1.46 allow for unbounded memory allocation while decoding a ZlibEncoded byte stream. An attacker could send a large ZlibEncoded byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.

advisories.description: This advisory has been marked as a false positive.
advisories.title: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer

advisories.description: The ZlibDecoders in Netty allow for unbounded memory allocation while decoding a ZlibEncoded byte stream. An attacker could send a large ZlibEncoded byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 4.1, all versions starting from 4.1.46
advisories.title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption

advisories.description: The `ZlibDecoders` in Netty contains an unbounded memory allocation while decoding a `ZlibEncoded` byte stream. An attacker could send a large `ZlibEncoded` byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 4.1, all versions starting from 4.1.46
advisories.title: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer

advisories.description: The ZlibDecoders in Netty 4.1.x before 4.1.46 allow for unbounded memory allocation while decoding a ZlibEncoded byte stream. An attacker could send a large ZlibEncoded byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 4.1.0, all versions starting from 4.1.46
advisories.title: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling

description_data.value: The ZlibDecoders in Netty 4.1.x before 4.1.46 allow for unbounded memory allocation while decoding a ZlibEncoded byte stream. An attacker could send a large ZlibEncoded byte stream to the Netty server, forcing the server to allocate all of its free memory to a single decoder.
